metadata.Title: CVE-2023-6194 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: In Eclipse Memory Analyzer versions 0.7 to 1.14.0, report definition XMLfiles are not filtered to prohibitdocument type definition (DTD) references to external entities.This means that if a user chooses to use a malicious report definition XMLfile containing an external entity referenceto generate a report then Eclipse Memory Analyzer may access external filesor URLs defined via a DTD in the report definition.

criterions.comment: eclipse: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
